fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use a copied ability.
- Make your current acquired ability a permanent option. (Costs 2 Gold) (One Use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will absorb one random ability that was used on any Civilization.
- Copied abilities only have one use.
- You will not absorb any attributes, except for those directly relating to the ability.
- If no one visits a Civ, you will copy the ability of whoever you visit.
- Detection Immunity

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were slain by a Kongolese Ngao Mbeba.” (Factional Kill)
“You have gained the following ability: ______________________” (Gained ability)
